title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: I found this interesting article. It is mainly for beginners. It provides the proper guidance on how maximize profits from online crypto casinos. Beginners often find it difficult to win money from an online crypto casino often times because they have no strategy in place. The right techniques that gamblers must take cognizance of to make money and keep money from online crypto casinos are highlighted below:Play free spotsMake the most out of casino commission benefitsMonitor your fundsPlay the games that you’re skilled atBe aware of your betting patterns.Do you have any surefire strategies that works for you which is not in the list above? You can read the article here: https://blog.bc.game/how-can-you-make-money-effectively-from-online-crypto-casinos/

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Case to case basis for numbers 4 and 5. We have different games that we play. Number 1 is obvious. If it's free then take it but you have to be updated when these free rounds will be given. (just to correct, its "free slots" not "spots" according to the blog) I guess it's just a typo error from the OP.Number 2 is an important thing if you are planning high-stakes betting. Most of the online gambling sites do offer a lot of things for VIPs, platinum holders, or whatever they call them. Like freebies for hitting a bet amount, bonuses, and more. Surefire strategy? I don't think that exists unless you are cheating.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 03, 2022, 08:23:37 AMI found this interesting article. It is mainly for beginners. It provides the proper guidance on how maximize profits from online crypto casinos. Beginners often find it difficult to win money from an online crypto casino often times because they have no strategy in place. The right techniques that gamblers must take cognizance of to make money and keep money from online crypto casinos are highlighted below:Play free spotsMake the most out of casino commission benefitsMonitor your fundsPlay the games that you’re skilled atBe aware of your betting patterns.Do you have any surefire strategies that works for you which is not in the list above? You can read the article here: https://blog.bc.game/how-can-you-make-money-effectively-from-online-crypto-casinos/I think the only way to maximize profits for beginners or experts there is not much difference in gambling for me between categories is that you stick at playing games where skill is predominant compared to luck.So in order to maximize your chances for winnings I suggest you play games of skills like sport betting where a good analysis of the game can give you an edge,in sport betting there is 50% skill and 50% luck or you can play poker,the form that you like the most but from what I have seen Texas Holdem is the most popular and here skill is at 80% and luck at 20%,so in these kind of games where skill is considerably part of the game you can maximize your chances to win.If you play slots,dice and roulette you are playing 100% luck based games and you don't maximize your chances for winnings here.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: you forgot to add "Choose games that provide the best bonuses and odds". if you plan to maximize your profit from an online casino picking the games with the best bonuses and odds will be to your advantage. it would be better if you found a casino that you are good at and also has the best bonuses and odds.

comments.author: AicecreaME
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on June 03, 2022, 09:18:39 AMQuote from: Davidvictorson on June 03, 2022, 08:23:37 AMI found this interesting article. It is mainly for beginners. It provides the proper guidance on how maximize profits from online crypto casinos. Beginners often find it difficult to win money from an online crypto casino often times because they have no strategy in place. The right techniques that gamblers must take cognizance of to make money and keep money from online crypto casinos are highlighted below:Play free spotsMake the most out of casino commission benefitsMonitor your fundsPlay the games that you’re skilled atBe aware of your betting patterns.Do you have any surefire strategies that works for you which is not in the list above? You can read the article here: https://blog.bc.game/how-can-you-make-money-effectively-from-online-crypto-casinos/I think the only way to maximize profits for beginners or experts there is not much difference in gambling for me between categories is that you stick at playing games where skill is predominant compared to luck.So in order to maximize your chances for winnings I suggest you play games of skills like sport betting where a good analysis of the game can give you an edge,in sport betting there is 50% skill and 50% luck or you can play poker,the form that you like the most but from what I have seen Texas Holdem is the most popular and here skill is at 80% and luck at 20%,so in these kind of games where skill is considerably part of the game you can maximize your chances to win.If you play slots,dice and roulette you are playing 100% luck based games and you don't maximize your chances for winnings here.I agree with you, mate. In order to maximize and utilize your winning profits, you must know to assess whether to stick or explore other games to play. If you know you mostly win in skill based game, then go for skill based games and improve your knowledge with it. Just like what you said, the most suitable gambling type would be sport if someone is into analyzation and luck. Chances of winning sports betting is higher if you know the team's background and its players capability. The rest you just believe and hold tight that the odds will be on your favor because sometimes the tables just suddenly turn around.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: danherbias07 on June 03, 2022, 09:07:33 AMSurefire strategy? I don't think that exists unless you are cheating. Surefire strategy is none existence in gambling, if someone told you that he has a tutorial or an e-book or video that you can buy for a surefire strategy he's trying to fool you, there's a lot of this on Youtube forcing you to click bait and there was a post here about doubling your bet to regain your losses which is the strategy he has tried it to himself and got busted over and over again because the house always had the edge.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 03, 2022, 08:23:37 AMI found this interesting article. It is mainly for beginners. It provides the proper guidance on how maximize profits from online crypto casinos. Beginners often find it difficult to win money from an online crypto casino often times because they have no strategy in place. The right techniques that gamblers must take cognizance of to make money and keep money from online crypto casinos are highlighted below:Play free spotsMake the most out of casino commission benefitsMonitor your fundsPlay the games that you’re skilled atBe aware of your betting patterns.Do you have any surefire strategies that works for you which is not in the list above? You can read the article here: https://blog.bc.game/how-can-you-make-money-effectively-from-online-crypto-casinos/Would agree to play on the games you're skill at because this could increase your chances to earn but we should always think that even if we are skilled it will not give us any guarantee that everyday is good day to us, for sure there's still a day that we are not so lucky that's why aside from skills we also need to have patience so that we will not get pissed up and bet more once we are starting to lose. Discipline is some what we need in gambling because if we have this for sure we will not get hype up and frequently we will always think to take profit once we are winning already.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: I have seen so many of these so-called surefire strategies even playing you are good and knowing the games is not a surefire strategy to make a profit it's still gambling, but having control over your fund is a sure way to cut your losses, gambling is never a cash cow, you can only cut your loss but you can never guarantee your profit, the bottom line is focused on enjoying the game not on making a profit.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 03, 2022, 08:23:37 AMPlay the games that you’re skilled atThere's an unpopular opinion that to ensure success, you have to master that which you already know and ensure that you know it very well before trying to learn something new. I quite agree with it. In gambling, trying to play every game may be the fastest way for you to loose your money, the best approach should be playing games that you are skilled at, and improving your skill set on that particular game to ensure that your probability of failure reduces considerably before trying out other games. Jumping around and trying to gamble on every game will do your pocket no good.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: Aside from this, you have to check different casinos from time to time as they offer different promotions that could easily net you some decent profits. These promotions could be in a form of a contest, lottery, giveaway, etc. Also, some of the good ones only appear once or twice so you really need to be active and take advantage whenever the opportunity appears. One of the downsides with promotions is that you could miss out on some of them if the promo is related to a game provider like evolution or pragmatic for example and you're from one of the geo-restricted countries.

comments.author: Kasabus
comments.body: Bonuses and promotions are just temporary, if you want to make consistent money, you have to rely on your skills to earn. Unfortunately, not everyone has the skills that's why not everyone are winning in gambling, but if you have the skills, you can use that to monetize from gambling sites, just hope that they'll not ban you if you are consistently making money from them.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 03, 2022, 08:23:37 AMPlay free spotsNot a lot of casino places are offering free spots or free rolls. Most casinos are generous enough to give out free rolls if you meet certain wager criteria, but that also forces people to shell out some money in order to get those bonuses. Regardless. it is still a good strategy to take advantage of these bonuses when they are on, but is not wise to shell out all your funds just to get them for one session.

comments.author: Betwrong
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 03, 2022, 08:23:37 AM~Play the games that you’re skilled at~This is a tricky part. When I was only starting, years ago, I thought I was skilled in dice game.  Really, I thought I'd figured it out. And, amazingly enough, it was kind of "working". For weeks! I wasn't making a fortune, but 2-3 bucks per day was big money for me back then. Then, of course, it stopped working, because it was never working, in the first place. Only later I learned that you can invent any strategy for any purely luck-based game, and it can be "working" for some time. So, before starting playing "the games that you’re skilled at", find out, do those games depend on skill, at least partially.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: 2 is the strategy used by most people to win against the house afaik, there was even a case where the player talked with the casino to remove the house, not really sure for the duration(since he was a usual player and played in the casino for so long, so can be considered as a user perk). Plus, it gives free plays for you to do, so it's something to naturally take advantage of. 3 is something you do in anything that involves expenses imo, and 4 and 5 are pretty much dependent on what you yourself play. And in the case of 4, it doesn't necessarily increase the chances sometimes since games like slots aren't really skill reliant. Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 03, 2022, 08:23:37 AMDo you have any surefire strategies that works for you which is not in the list above? Does not gambling count?

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 03, 2022, 08:23:37 AM The right techniques that gamblers must take cognizance of to make money and keep money from online crypto casinos are highlighted below:Monitor your fundsPlay the games that you’re skilled atBe aware of your betting patterns.Do you have any surefire strategies that works for you which is not in the list above? Monitor your funds is a must its not easy there's always the temptation to pour everything, money management applies to a good gambling experience, playing games that you are skilled at is safely securing your money and making a profit but takes away the enjoyment of playing in a casino, being aware of your betting patterns should be on every gambler's mind so he'll know the path to winning and what to avoid to incur big losses.You need a good character to implement these things, compulsive don't care about these points, they just go on making a bet and just wish luck is on their side.

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: How many times do we have to discuss that in a casino there is really no surefire strategy? Casino games are luck-based games. You can win not because of your strategies but because you are lucky. If you are profitable today with a certain strategy, it does not mean you will be profitable tomorrow even with the same strategy. I am talking about majority of casino games. They require no skill at all. They only require that you are lucky.

comments.author: Welsh
comments.body: The only way you can safely maximise profits would be matched betting, and there's definitely some debate regarding whether that's moral to do or not. Although, a lot of people find a justification that the gambling websites they're using don't care about them, so why should they.However, that's the only really fool proof way of earning money without much risk or risk at all. The only risk really is if you make a mistake or don't quite understand it. The rest of these maximising profit guides aren't worth even considering, as it's entirely luck based, and that's why the casinos, and bookies make so much money.

Games that you have experience and skilled with should be played that games and rounds. This increases the chances of winning. And it gives you the confidence to win[/list]

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: Gambling is risky, and I don't think there is an effective and profitable strategy eventually because it always depends on luck. To increase your chances of winning, you must not chase loss and surrender to your feelings easily and do not try to be an addict!!! If you are in a bad mood do not try to join the gambling because you will not be able to adjust the controller, this, of course, will make you lose a lot of money.I agree with the author of the article about joining the games you are good at because your chances of winning will be high.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: In life, you can win big and lose big, henceforth you must apply same principles for your trading, investment and gambling.If you win big, make sure you protect your capital first. How?Withdraw your capital from exchange or gambling site first. Make your plan to don't touch your initial capital part again, if you don't lose all profit partIn case you lose all of profit part, make sure you take a rest that can be days or weeks too calm down your soul and emotion.Because if you don't give your mind, soul a cool down time, you will lose all profit and initial capital with stupid decisionsFree spins from casino is good option to try your luck.
